snippet: The mayor of a southwestern Missouri town resigned on Tuesday in the wake of community anger over anti-Semitic comments he made in reference to recent killings at two Jewish community facilities in Kansas....

headline.print_headline: Missouri Mayor Quits After Anti-Semitic Remarks Tied to Kansas Killings
headline.main: Missouri Mayor Quits After Anti-Semitic Remarks Tied to Kansas Killings

lead_paragraph: The mayor of a southwestern Missouri town resigned on Tuesday in the wake of community anger over anti-Semitic comments he made in reference to recent killings at two Jewish community facilities in Kansas.
